statements.query: MATCH (:BitbucketWorkspace)<-[r:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (n:BitbucketWorkspace)<-[r:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})  WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:BitbucketProjects)<-[r:PROJETS]-(:BitbucketWorkspace)<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH  (n:BitbucketProjects)<-[:PROJETS]-(:BitbucketWorkspace)<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})  WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:BitbucketRepository)-[r:REPOSITORY]->(:BitbucketProjects)<-[:PROJETS]-(:BitbucketWorkspace)<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH  (n:BitbucketRepository)-[:REPOSITORY]->(:BitbucketProjects)<-[:PROJETS]-(:BitbucketWorkspace)<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})  WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:BitbucketMember)<-[r:MEMBER]-(:BitbucketWorkspace)<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH  (n:BitbucketMember)<-[:MEMBER]-(:BitbucketWorkspace)<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})  WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
